Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
services.ProjectService
public class ProjectService extends Object
Service class for managing project-related operations. Provides comprehensive functionality for project management including:
  • Project creation, update, and deletion
  • Project filtering and visibility management
  • Officer assignment and slot management
  • Project retrieval by various criteria

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectService

      public ProjectService()

  • Method Details

    • getProjects

      public static List<Project> getProjects(List<Filter> filters)
      Retrieves projects matching specified filters. Applies all provided filters to the project list. Supported filter keys:
      • "location" - Filters by project location
      • "flat_type" - Filters by available flat types
      Parameters:
      filters - List of filters to apply
      Returns:
      List of projects matching all filters

    • getAllProjects

      public static List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves all projects in the system.
      Returns:
      List of all projects

    • getVisibleProjects

      public static List<Project> getVisibleProjects()
      Retrieves projects visible to the current user based on their role. Visibility rules:
      • Applicants: Only visible projects within application period
      • Officers: All projects
      • Managers: All projects
      Returns:
      List of visible projects

    • getProjectByName

      public static Project getProjectByName(String projectName)
      Retrieves a project by its name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to find
      Returns:
      The matching project or null if not found

    • getProjectByOfficer

      public static Project getProjectByOfficer(Officer officer)
      Retrieves the project assigned to a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer to find project for
      Returns:
      The officer's assigned project or null if none

    • getProjectsByManager

      public static List<Project> getProjectsByManager(Manager manager)
      Retrieves all projects managed by a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager to find projects for
      Returns:
      List of projects managed by the specified manager

    • createProject

      public static void createProject(String projectId, String managerNRIC, String projectName, String location, LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate, int officerSlots, boolean visible)
      Creates a new project with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      projectId - Unique project identifier
      managerNRIC - NRIC of the managing manager
      projectName - Name of the project
      location - Project location
      startDate - Application opening date
      endDate - Application closing date
      officerSlots - Number of available officer slots
      visible - Visibility status

    • updateProject

      public static void updateProject(Project project, String location, LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Updates basic project information.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to update
      location - the new location
      startDate - the new application opening date
      endDate - the new application closing date

    • deleteProject

      public static void deleteProject(String projectName)
      Deletes a project by name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - name of the project to delete

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public static void toggleProjectVisibility(String projectName, boolean visible)
      Toggles a project's visibility status.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project to update
      visible - the new visibility status

    • hasOfficerSlots

      public static boolean hasOfficerSlots(Project project)
      Checks if a project has available officer slots.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to check
      Returns:
      true if officer slots are available, false otherwise

    • addOfficerToProject

      public static void addOfficerToProject(Project project, String officerNRIC)
      Assigns an officer to a project. Reduces available officer slots when successful.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to assign to
      officerNRIC - NRIC of the officer to assign

    • removeOfficerFromProject

      public static void removeOfficerFromProject(Project project, String officerNRIC)
      Removes an officer from a project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to remove from
      officerNRIC - NRIC of the officer to remove

    • getAllOfficersProjects

      public static List<Project> getAllOfficersProjects(String officerNRIC)
      Retrieves all projects assigned to a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officerNRIC - NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      List of projects the officer is assigned to
